WorkItem.Description:
Started a separate ticket since the other one seems to not correctly target the issue.  Apologies if that was incorrect.
 
My Key to the Endless Chamber is updated with the new ICD value giving it 1710 AGI 15s/75s.  Unequipping the trinket loses me 333 AGI (the average AGI by up time and proc rate).  Unequipping this trinket also loses me 666 armor which is 2x the agi lost.
 
I have a sneaking suspicion that my trinkets will be changing when this is fixed.
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Proc AGI is still providing armor.

Comments.Message: Ah hah. Confirmed, Agi from Special Effects is still giving armor. I'll get that fixed, thanks!
